channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brothers say Hawaii police framed them for tourist's 1991 murder
item.description: Albert "Ian" Schweitzer, who spent over two decades in prison for the killing of Dana Ireland, was released in 2023 based on new evidence.

item.title: Idaho murders suspect's lawyers want DNA evidence thrown out
item.description: Bryan Kohberger is charged with four counts of murder in the deaths of Ethan Chapin, Xana Kernodle, Madison Mogen and Kaylee Goncalves.

item.title: Cracks emerge in House GOP after speaker’s threat to saddle California wildfire aid with conditions
This scientist studies climate change. Then the Los Angeles fire destroyed his home
item.description: Climate scientist Ben Hamlington works on understanding the impacts of climate change. Losing his house in the Eaton Fire has given that work new mean...

item.title: Postcards From The Border aims to challenge dominant portrayal of U.S.-Mexico border
item.description: Challenging perceptions of the US-Mexico border: A new Texas art project uses music, photos and storytelling to highlight the the rich cultural tapest...

item.title: This economist survived a wildfire. Now she's taking on California's insurance crisis
item.description: An economist's harrowing escape from fire, and her big ideas to rescue California from its insurance doom spiral.

item.title: Trump tells Putin to end 'ridiculous war' in Ukraine or face new sanctions
item.description: The US president says he is offering Moscow a "big favour" by helping Russia and Ukraine reach a deal.

item.title: Thailand same-sex marriage law takes effect: "Every love is the same"
item.description: Hundreds of LGBTQ couples in Thailand get married as the country's landmark marriage equality law comes into effect.

item.title: Meta denies forcing users to follow Trump accounts
item.description: The Facebook and Instagram owner says the official profiles were updated to reflect the new position holders.

item.title: The Gulf of Whatnow? Mapmakers grapple with Trump’s geographic renaming plans
item.description: Mapmakers and teachers are re-thinking what to call the gulf of water between Mexico, the United States and Cuba after President Donald Trump ordered ...

item.title: India investigates 17 'mysterious' deaths in same village
item.description: At least 17 people, mostly children, have died unexplained deaths in the same village in Jammu.

item.title: Firefighters battle to maintain the upper hand on a huge fire north of Los Angeles
Nepal hits Everest climbers with higher permit fees
item.description: The price to climb the world's tallest peak will soon increase for the first time in almost a decade.

item.title: Oscar nominations to be announced Thursday for 2025 awards
item.description: Nominations for the 97th annual Academy Awards are being announced Thursday morning. Watch live as the full list of Oscar nominees is unveiled.

item.title: Thousands evacuated as new fast-growing fire ignites near Los Angeles
item.description: The out-of-control wildfire spans more than 10,000 acres after just a few hours, fuelled by winds.

item.title: Couples wed as landmark same-sex marriage law takes effect in Thailand
item.description: Hundreds of same-sex couples tied the knot across Thailand on Thursday, as the country becomes the first in Southeast Asia to legally recognize equal ...

item.title: Sepulveda Fire ignites near 405 Freeway, with temporary evacuation warnings in Bel Air
item.description: It was first reported just after 11 p.m. near northbound lanes of the freeway in Sherman Oaks, according to the Los Angeles Fire Department.

item.title: In a surprise, U.S. colleges saw higher enrollment last fall
item.description: The number of students in undergraduate and graduate programs rose above pre-pandemic levels for the first time.
